title: Building a MASSIVE Bass Pond on a Goat Farm!

tasks.task: Coyote Hunting with a High-Powered Rifle

subtasks: Bringing goats to a feeding area
Feeding the goats with persimmon leaves
Preparing a fishing rod and bait
Taking a dog (Daisy Poots) along for fishing
Casting a line in a pond
Discussed plans for constructing a 38-acre lake
Considering the placement of the dam and its depth
Planning features such as springs and fish species
Checking on cattle and their interaction with sheep
Managing llama (Paul) and its interaction with farm animals
Preparing for filming (e.g., bending trees for goats, showing farm layout)
Interviewing workers (e.g., viewing a rod design)
Conducting on-farm activities for video content (e.g., fishing, feeding goats)
